type.description: The type of the prop in valid TypeScript syntax.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the prop if defined.

required.description: Indicate hether the prop is required.

deprecated.description: Indicate whether the prop is deprecated.

description.description: A concise description of the prop.

id.description: A unique identifier for the component. Use kebab-case (e.g. "tree-view").

name.description: The display name of the component. Use PascalCase (e.g. "TreeView").

a11yReviewed.description: Indicate whether the component has been reviewed by the Accessibility team.

stories.description: An array of Storybook story IDs to embed in the docs.

props.description: An array of the component's props.

name.description: The display name of the subcomponent, including the name of the root component (e.g. "TreeView.Item").

deprecated.description: Indicate whether the subcomponent is deprecated.

props.description: An array of the subcomponent's props.
